template.name: DataReset
template.declaration: const int reset_value = 10; // there has to be at least one update within this time

template.name: Client
Cloud
Gateway
GW_Internal
OT
CTR

query.formula: Pr[<=32700](<>((expected_frequency < current_time - cloudLastUpdate) && ((expected_frequency - 2) >= current_time - gwLastSync) && gwPingSuccess))
